subtitles.text: Here we go, Upgami, this time with Morning Musume。 23 and Rio Sakurai of Morning Musume。 23 and Rio Sakurai from Morning Musume'23.
This is a program that takes you behind the scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the Upfront Group.
We will show you the process of recording and rehearsal.

Now then, let's start with a behind-the-scenes look at the two MC's. I'm Kitagawa, and I'll be delivering this program. I, Kitagawa, celebrated the 4th anniversary of joining the 15th term on June 22nd, the day of this distribution.
Congratulations. Thank you very much. It really feels as if it was only a few days ago that I joined the group.
I was surprised to see how quickly time flies.
We talk backstage all the time and keep in touch with each other as a group, so I am really looking forward to another year of hard work toward our 5th anniversary.
When I hear about the anniversary, I really feel that it has passed in the blink of an eye.
I, Sakurai, also finished the spring tour, which was my second tour as a soloist, and the concert at the hall was over,

Although this was only my second time as a member of the group, there were some songs that I performed for the first time, and from the middle of this tour, cheering was introduced as a part of the concert, so I will never forget the thrill of hearing the cheers of the fans directly.
I will never forget the feeling of hearing the cheers of the fans.
I remember that it was a lot of fun to hear the different voices of the fans depending on the location, and to see whether there were more men or more women today.
It was really nice. Since the cheering has become a real gold mine, I can feel that the fans' hearts are more energetic than before.
I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm really looking forward to it.
Let's start off with this time's uploads.

I was really impressed by the way he played the first time, and the director was trying to make it better, but from our point of view, it was just too much from the very first shot,
But it was really impressive to see Mr. Kobayashi enjoying the recording process so much, and we could really feel how much he loves the piano,
I could really feel that Mr. Kobayashi's power made this song more and more magnificent and brought it more and more to life,
